testcase.name: test_task
testcase.system-out: . a => custom title . b => Python: function test_task.<locals>.b . c:echo => Cmd: echo hi . c:c_ => Python: function test_task.<locals>.c.<locals>.c_ . c:subtask 0 => this is 0 running . c:subtask 0 variant => this is 0 running variant . c:subtask 1 => this is 1 running . c:subtask 1 variant => this is 1 running variant
